entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
